name: IKEA_desk_assembly
description: Assembly process for a simple IKEA desk (MICKE or similar model)

states.description: Unopened IKEA desk box on the floor
Box opened with all components laid out on the floor: 4 legs, 1 tabletop, 1 drawer unit, screws, Allen key
Components sorted and organized by type: legs in one pile, hardware separated, instructions visible
Two legs attached to the drawer unit forming one side of the desk frame
All four legs attached to the drawer unit, creating a stable base frame
Tabletop placed on the frame but not secured, desk is upright but unstable
Completed desk with tabletop secured to the frame, all screws tightened, desk is stable and ready to use

actions.description: Open the box and remove all components
Sort components by type and lay out the instruction manual
Attach two legs to the drawer unit using screws and Allen key
Attach the remaining two legs to complete the base frame
Flip the frame upright and place the tabletop on the frame
Secure the tabletop to the frame with screws and tighten all connections
